filters.FILTER_DESC: It adds a filter. If someone writes your filter, it send the answer. If you just write .filter, it show's your filter list.
filters.NO_FILTER: *❌ There are no filters in this chat!*
filters.FILTERS: *🔎 There is your filters in this chat:*
filters.STOP_DESC: Stops the filter you added previously.
filters.ALREADY_NO_FILTER: *❌ There is already no filter like this!*

greetings.NOT_SET_WELCOME:
*🧜‍♀️💬You don't set the welcome message yet.!*
**To set:** ```.welcome hi && hi#how are you?```
greetings.NEED_WELCOME_TEXT:
*🧜‍♀️💬You must write a message to set up the welcome message.*
*Example:* ```.welcome hi && hi#how are you?```
greetings.WELCOME_DELETED: *✅ Welcome message has been deleted successfully!*
greetings.WELCOME_SETTED: *✅ Welcome message has been set successfully!*
greetings.NOT_SET_GOODBYE:
*🧜‍♀️💬You didn't set a goodbye message!*
*To set:* ```.goodbye bye && bye#see ya```
greetings.NEED_GOODBYE_TEXT:
*🧜‍♀️💬You must write a message to set up the goodbye message.*
*Example:* ```.goodbye bye && bye#see ya```
greetings.GOODBYE_DELETED: *✅ Goodbye message has been deleted successfully!*
greetings.GOODBYE_SETTED: *✅ Goodbye message has been setted successfully!*
